text: Ernest Blake (24 March 1895 – 1965) was an English professional footballer who played as a Winger. ==References== Category:1895 births Category:1965 deaths Category:People from Hednesford Category:English footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Grimsby Rovers F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Haycroft Rovers F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Ernest Blake (footballer)
